question: Nima Jangmu Sherpa made a world record by scaling three highest mountains in a single climbing season. She belongs to which country?
explanation: Nima Jangmu Sherpa of Nepal made a world record by scaling three highest mountains in a single climbing season. She made her ascent on Mt Kanchenjunga, which is the third highest peak of the world. She is 28 years old. She has become the only woman in the world to climb three highest peaks in Nepal above 8,000 meters in one seasonwithin 25 days.
